Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
optimum \optimum\ adj. Best possible or most desirable; -- usually under a restriction expressed or implied; as, an optimum return on capital; optimum concentration of a drug; an optimum result.
Syn: optimal. [WordNet 1.5]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: optimum \optimum\ n. The most favorable condition, greatest degree, or largest amount possible under given circumstances. [WordNet 1.5]

optimum adj : most desirable possible under a restriction expressed or implied; "an optimum return on capital"; "optimal concentration of a drug" [syn: {optimal}] n : most favorable condition or greatest degree or amount possible under given circumstances [also: {optima} (pl)]
